intro: Psychotria phaneroloma, commonly known as the showy psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking, colorful flowers that range from red to violet, often with contrasting white or yellow markings. Its leaves are typically elliptical and have a smooth texture, while its stems are slender and somewhat woody. Psychotria phaneroloma is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests.
